text: Mica Mazdoor Sangh, a trade union of mica mine labourers in the Gudur minesfields in Andhra Pradesh, India. MMS is affiliated to Bharatiya Mazdoor Sangh. MMS claims a membership of 1500 out of a total of 7000 workers. Source: PUCL Category:Bharatiya Mazdoor Sangh-affiliated unions
title: Mica Mazdoor Sangh
